snippet: Mr. Okiishi has used flat-screen monitors as canvases on which to paint attractive, drippy flurries of brush strokes.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews Ken Okiishi exhibit at Reena Spaulings Fine Art.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Okiishi has used flat-screen monitors as canvases on which to paint attractive, drippy flurries of brush strokes.

headline.print_headline: Ken Okiishi: Reena Spaulings Fine Art
